content.raw:
The official distribution of cppcheck on trusty is version 1.61. Our Jenkins servers do not report the error, so I assume they don't have special packages installed. I don't know who or why the drone.io job was established, but it seems it is not configured properly.  We should still fix the errors since they will appear on vivid, but I'll have to find a vivid machine to properly test.

Who created the drone.io job for gazebo? There doesn't seem to be any information about it, and also no way get notifications from it. I know there are a bunch of drone.io jobs, and all of these should fall under an osrfoundation account that is listed on our internal wiki.
content.html:
The official distribution of cppcheck on trusty is version 1.61. Our Jenkins servers do not report the error, so I assume they don't have special packages installed. I don't know who or why the drone.io job was established, but it seems it is not configured properly. We should still fix the errors since they will appear on vivid, but I'll have to find a vivid machine to properly test.

Who created the drone.io job for gazebo? There doesn't seem to be any information about it, and also no way get notifications from it. I know there are a bunch of drone.io jobs, and all of these should fall under an osrfoundation account that is listed on our internal wiki.
